TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Thumb extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示可以由用户拖动的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以包括在另一个控件，如或控制，用于以使用户能够更改控件的值。The control can be included in another control, such as a or control, to let the user change the control's value. 还可用来调整控件的大小。The can also be used to resize controls. 例如，窗口的角的控件可以提供用户使用鼠标即可执行大小调整操作单击的位置。For example, a control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation. 提供，和事件来管理拖动鼠标指针与关联的操作。 provides , and events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer. 当用户按下鼠标左键时控件接收逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获和引发事件。When the user presses the left mouse button, the control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the event is raised. 虽然控件具有焦点和鼠标捕获，事件可以无限制引发多次。While the control has focus and mouse capture, the event can be raised multiple times without limit. 当用户释放鼠标左键控件失去鼠标捕获和引发事件。When the user releases the left mouse button, the control loses mouse capture and the event is raised. 事件信息提供在位置的更改，但不会重新。The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the . 你必须手动更改或重新定位或你想要调整大小或更改作为拖动操作结果的任何其他元素。You must manually change or reposition the or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation. 控件不提供拖放功能。The control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality. A控件可以接收鼠标捕获，但不能接收键盘焦点。A control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus. 因此，对应于键盘焦点的属性设置为`false`。Therefore, the property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`. 此值将覆盖父类，将此属性设置为`true`。This value overrides the parent class that sets this property to `true`. 为了提供拖动功能，类处理提供了有关，和事件。To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the , and events. 有关详细信息，请参阅，和方法。For more information, see the , and methods. 当属于可视区域中，或视区中的大小的内容滚动的控件反映视区的大小。When a is part of a control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the reflects the size of the viewport. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 下图显示是的一部分的控件控件。The following illustration shows a control that is part of a control. ![Scrollbar 图](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar 图")![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## 自定义 Thumb 控件Customizing the Thumb Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[Thumb Syles 和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Thumb Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-syles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在按钮控件的默认模板中，通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelDrag() cil managed

summary.span: 取消对 的拖动操作。

span.span: Cancels a drag operation for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有鼠标捕获和逻辑焦点时，此方法删除鼠标捕获，并引发事件。If a has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragCompleted As DragCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在 控件失去鼠标捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这释放鼠标左键时或当事件发生调用方法。This event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the method is called. 控件接收到鼠标捕获，当用户在鼠标指针暂停时按鼠标左键控件。The control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the control. 鼠标位置时发生事件时提供的的最后一个事件。The position of the mouse when the event occurs is provided by the of the last event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何分配的事件处理程序事件控件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[Thumb 拖功能示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#DragCompletedHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#dragcompletedhandler)] [!code-vb[Thumb#DragCompletedHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#dragcompletedhandler)]

Public Shared ReadOnly DragCompletedEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragDelta As DragDeltaEventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获时，随着鼠标位置更改发生一次或多次。

span.span: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a control has logical focus and mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件接收到焦点和鼠标捕获，当用户在鼠标指针暂停时按鼠标左键控件。The control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the control. 控件失去鼠标捕获，或当用户释放鼠标左键时调用方法。The control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the method is called. 一个新事件发生在屏幕移动鼠标指针位置的每个时间。A new event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen. 因此，引发此事件可以是多个时间无限制时控件具有鼠标捕获。Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a control has mouse capture. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何分配的事件处理程序事件控件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[Thumb 拖功能示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件接收到焦点和鼠标捕获，当用户在鼠标指针暂停时按鼠标左键。The control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何分配的事件处理程序事件控件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[Thumb 拖功能示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). summary.span: 获取 控件是否具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获，以及鼠标左键是否按下。

span.span: Gets whether the control has logical focus and mouse capture and the left mouse button is pressed.

value.span: 如果 控件具有焦点和鼠标捕获，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性更改其值，调用方法。When the property changes its value, the method is called. 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，具有的受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现处理事件通过设置到`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting to `true`. 此外，此方法提供逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获和集属性`true`。Also, this method gives the logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the property to `true`. 此实现还引发事件。This implementation also raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现处理事件通过设置到`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting to `true`. 此外，此方法可以删除从鼠标捕获，并将设置属性`false`。Also, this method removes mouse capture from the , and sets the property to `false`. 此实现还引发事件。This implementation also raises the event.

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获，此实现将引发当鼠标移动事件。If the has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the event when the mouse moves. 在此方案中，通过设置处理事件到`true`。In this scenario, the event is handled by setting to `true`.
